Ok here is my problem i have my max level set at lvl 185 however when a player reaches lvl 135 they make a 50 level jump right to level 185.

Does anyone know how to fix this problem.

This is what i have below:

[code] public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 0;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 185; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 500.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 185;
}[/code]

Any help would be greatly apreciated.
